verses.verse: Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Ye have <S%H8104>kept<s%> all that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, and have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> in all that I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you:

Ye have not <S%H5800>left<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> these <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, but have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath given <S%H5117>rest<s%> unto your <S%H251>brethren<s%>, as he <S%H1696>promised<s%> them: therefore now <S%H6437>return<s%> ye, and <S%H3212>get<s%> you unto your <S%H168>tents<s%>, and unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

But take <S%H3966>diligent<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> and the <S%H8451>law<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> you, to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and to <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto him, and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them, and sent them <S%H7971>away<s%>: and they <S%H3212>went<s%> unto their <S%H168>tents<s%>.

¶ Now to the one <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> possession in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>: but unto the other <S%H2677>half<s%> thereof <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>. And when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> sent them <S%H7971>away<s%> also unto their <S%H168>tents<s%>, then he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them,

And he <S%H559>spake<s%> unto them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7725>Return<s%> with <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5233>riches<s%> unto your <S%H168>tents<s%>, and with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, with <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and with <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and with <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H8008>raiment<s%>: <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> with your <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H3212>departed<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> unto the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, to the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H272>possession<s%>, whereof they were <S%H270>possessed<s%>, according to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

¶ And when they <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H1552>borders<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, that are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar<s%> by <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> to see <S%H4758>to<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, Behold, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> have <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, in the <S%H1552>borders<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, at the <S%H5676>passage<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it, the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, to go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%> against them.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>,

And with him <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%>, of <S%H259%H259>each<s%> <S%H5387%H5387>chief<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> a <S%H1>prince<s%> throughout all the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and each <S%H376>one<s%> was an <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> among the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

¶ And they <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and they <S%H1696>spake<s%> with them, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, What <S%H4604>trespass<s%> is this that ye have <S%H4603>committed<s%> against the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to turn <S%H7725>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, in that ye have <S%H1129>builded<s%> you an <S%H4196>altar<s%>, that ye might <S%H4775>rebel<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>?

Is the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%> too <S%H4592>little<s%> for us, from which we are not <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> until this <S%H3117>day<s%>, although there was a <S%H5063>plague<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>,

But that ye must turn <S%H7725>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? and it will be, seeing ye <S%H4775>rebel<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> he will be <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H389>Notwithstanding<s%>, if the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%> be <S%H2931>unclean<s%>, then pass ye <S%H5674>over<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, wherein the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%>, and take <S%H270>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> us: but <S%H4775>rebel<s%> not against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against us, in <S%H1129>building<s%> you an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H1107>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.

Did not <S%H5912>Achan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> in the accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%>, and <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H1961>fell<s%> on all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? and that <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1478>perished<s%> not <S%H259>alone<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

¶ Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%>, and <S%H1696>said<s%> unto the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods<s%>, he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> he shall <S%H3045>know<s%>; if it be in <S%H4777>rebellion<s%>, or if in <S%H4604>transgression<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H3467>(save<s%> us not this <S%H3117>day<s%>,)

That we have <S%H1129>built<s%> us an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, or if to <S%H5927>offer<s%> thereon burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> or meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>, or if to <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> thereon, let the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> himself <S%H1245>require<s%> it;

And if we have not rather <S%H6213>done<s%> it for <S%H1674>fear<s%> of this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, In time to <S%H4279>come<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> might <S%H559>speak<s%> unto our <S%H1121>children<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What have ye to do with the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> a <S%H1366>border<s%> between us and you, ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>; ye have no <S%H2506>part<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: so shall your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7673>make<s%> our <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7673>cease<s%> <S%H1115>from<s%> <S%H3372>fearing<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
Therefore we <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us now <S%H6213>prepare<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> us an <S%H4196>altar<s%>, not for burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, nor for <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>:

But that it may be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> between us, and you, and our <S%H1755>generations<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> us, that we might <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him with our burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, and with our <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, and with our peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>; that your <S%H1121>children<s%> may not <S%H559>say<s%> to our <S%H1121>children<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, Ye have no <S%H2506>part<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Therefore <S%H559>said<s%> we, that it shall be, when they should so <S%H559>say<s%> to us or to our <S%H1755>generations<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, that we may <S%H559>say<s%> again, <S%H7200>Behold<s%> the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%>, not for burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, nor for <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>; but it is a <S%H5707>witness<s%> between us and you.

God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that we should <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> for burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, for meat <S%H4503>offerings<s%>, or for <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, beside the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

¶ And when <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> which were with him, <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%>, it <S%H3190%H5869>pleased<s%> them.

And <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, This <S%H3117>day<s%> we <S%H3045>perceive<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> us, because ye have not <S%H4603>committed<s%> this <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: <S%H227>now<s%> ye have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ And <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H5387>princes<s%>, <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H7725>brought<s%> them <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3190%H5869>pleased<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and did not <S%H559>intend<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> against them in <S%H6635>battle<s%>, to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> Ed: for it shall be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> between us that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%>.
